InnovativeWeb

Selected Projects

These are a few of the projects I have been working on. I continue to add new features to each of them as learn new things

Web App Dashboard

In this project, I have created a web dashboard complete with JavaScript-driven charts and graphs. The dashboard consists of 8 different widgets displaying various social media information. The charts were implemented using the charts.js library and styled to fit the look of the page. This is only a prototype of the main page and does not extend past this single page nor does it use server-side technologies.

Technologies Used:
  • — HTML5
  • — CSS3
  • — jQuery
  • — Custom Vanilla JavaScript
  • — Fully Responsive
  • — Vector Graphics

Interactive Video Player

In this project, I created a custom HTML5 video player using JavaScript and the HTML Video API. Below the video, I have included a transcript that highlights as the video progresses. When a user clicks any part of the transcript, they are taken to the appropriate place in the video.

Tested In:
  • — Firefox 44
  • — Chrome 48
  • — IE 11
Technologies Used:
  • — HTML5
  • — CSS
  • — jQuery
  • — Custom Vanilla JavaScript
  • — Fully Responsive

Movie Gallery API

In this project, I used the Open Movie Database API (OMDb) web service to create a gallery based on a user’s input. Type the name of a movie and click search or press enter to create a gallery of movies posters whose title matches your search criteria.

After a gallery has been generated, clicking the poster will open a lightbox displaying detailed information about the movie.

Technologies Used:
  • — HTML5
  • — CSS3
  • — jQuery
  • — Implementation of Public API
  • — Responsive

Interactive Photo Gallery

In this project, I created an interactive photo gallery using customized JavaScript and jQuery plugins. The gallery includes a search area where descriptions of the available images can be entered. Once entered, the photos will hide or show depending on user input.

When the user clicks on a thumbnail, the photo will display in a lightbox. Arrows have been included on the lightbox to allow the user to navigate through the gallery.

Technologies Used:
  • — HTML
  • — CSS3
  • — jQuery Plugin Intergration
  • — Fully Responsive
